QuestData.Title: Overt Ops
QuestData.Description: My soldiers are out there, $n.$b$bI need you to find Baraat, Sorvos, and Telaamon. They were in the process of securing this area for Velen when the Legion came down on top of our heads.$b$bInform them that their orders are to regroup with the Prophet at once.$b$bThe time for subtlety has passed. There is a small army between us and them. Do what you must.$b$bLight keep you safe.
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate Baraat the Longshot, Grand Vindicator Sorvos, and Blademaster Telaamon.
QuestData.RewardText: Fareeya's forces are the best the Army of the Light has to offer. Our mission is that much more likely to succeed with them at our side.
